text: chaur anak( mou ham meat) dasatuen promean dl mnoussaalok ampi thngai del tearounakamm nung mokadl puokke . haey puok del bampean nung niyeay tha ao mcheasa robsa yeungokhnhom. saum trong me tda ponyearpel dl puok yeungokhnhom muoyorypel khlei phng choh. puok yeung nung ttuoloyk kar ampeavneav robsa trong haey puok yeung nung korp tam banda anak noam sar . ( mean ke niyeay towkean puok nih tha) tae puok anak minothleab ban sbath pimoun te ryytha puok anak nung min leacheak pi lokey( tow thngai barlok) te noh
